resources.string: This source is not supported. Try using another gallery app.
The grid helps to simulate lines like in the notebook. Here you can choose grid size. A zero value will disable the grid.
The more you press on the screen, the bolder the line is. Not all devices support this function
The bigger spot of your touch, the bolder the line is. Not all devices support this function
The faster you draw, the thinner the line is
The faster you draw, the bolder the line is
The thickness of the line does not change
Smoothes the edge of drawn lines
If you draw quickly, line becomes broken. This function will try to smooth it a little
Almost invisible \"sDraw\" mark will appear at the bottom right corner of picture
Allows to change instrument by clicking button on painting

Display the circle with the brush color selection. Palette can be moved, the placement of the colors is adapted to the new location. Long click on the palette opens the color picker. Long press on color changes the background color
On-screen menu button is provided for devices which doesn\'t have hardware menu button. Disable this option, if your device has this button
Show status bar at the top of the screen (clock, alert icons). This setting will be applied after restart
Show menu with instruments at the bottom of the screen.
Show scrollable palette at the bottom of the screen.
Program will undo your last change when you click the \"back\" button once
Use the volume buttons while drawing. If this option is enabled, you can not control the volume while drawing, but you can get an access to the frequently used functions
Display will be enabled while canvas is opened. This setting will be applied after restart
Screen backlight will work with maximum brightness while canvas is opened. This setting will be applied after restart
Program will draw pointer where your finger is hovering over the screen. This feature works only with some Samsung phones. This feature requires ROOT access.
Screen will blink to black and white multipe times while cleaning drawing. It is needed to prevent image glitching on e-ink screens
Display additional information on top of the program interface.

If the mode of brush managed by strength of the pressure reacts poorly at changing the force of the pressure, try to reset the value of the control coefficient. If it doesn\'t help, most likely that your device hardware doesn\'t support this option
(+)(-) Press volume buttons together for menu

It is a tool for inserting shapes. 
Chose the shape using the button on the top and move your finger across the screen. 
Use the top slider to change the stroke, 
and the bottom one to change the rotation
It is a tool for drawing straight lines. \nMove your finger across the screen to draw
You\'ve chosen scaling. \nUse one finger to navigate across scaled canvas. \nUse two fingers to change the scale
You\'ve chosen pipette. \nPipette allows choosing the colour on the drawing. \nBy tapping on an empty area you will get transparent colour!
Drawing with accurate brush. \nYou can move the cursor with one finger \nand push the activation button with the second one
Entrance into the developer entertainment center
Are you a developer of this program?
Do you really want to delete image?
Undo action skipped: fingers on screen
Color opacity allows you to achieve a specific color transition effect.
Not enough memory. Try again or restart application
Your free version of FP sDraw is expired now. \nYou can buy Pro version to support developer, or reset trial period for free.
You can use full version for %DAYS% days. Tap for more...
Free vesrion functionality is limited. How to remove limits?
Some functions were disabled, because of trial period expiration.
I suggest you to buy FP sDraw Pro, which has no limits. So you can support the developer.
If you don\'t want to buy FP sDraw Pro, you can start trial periog again. It\'s free.
You can do this as many times as you want.

Software development consumes a lot of time and effort, but I work hard to make my users happy with quality software. \nThis application contains no advertising, because it spoils the impression and increases file size. Application quality is more important for me. \nYou can support the developer by buying Pro version and get unlimited access to:
Palette at the bottom of the screen;
Instruments selector at the bottom of the screen;

Creating of this application consumed hundreds (!) hours of programming, designing and drawing icons. 
I am satisfied with the result, because I like this application and I use it frequently for personal needs. 
Also I am glad to share it and understand, that my time wasn't wasted. 
I'd like to express my gratitude to everyone, who helped me in development and testing! These people are listed on "About" screen.
Days, when you don\'t use application are not counted.
When trial period expires, some functions will be disabled.
There is no advertising in application.
If you don\'t want to buy FP sDraw Pro, you can start trial period again when it ends.
You can do it as many times as you want.
Some functions, which you\'re using now have time limitation.

Do you really want to start new trial period? \nNew trial period will start after restarting application and you\'ll be able to use full functionality for free. \nIf you like this application, consider buying FP sDraw Pro to support developer.
New trial period was started. \nYou can use all FP sDraw functions after restarting program. \nEnjoy!
This function is available under trial period
This function is available in FP sDraw Pro
You\'re using free version of program. It allows you to use all functions for free. But you can support developer by buying Pro version.

This application uses such permissions: 
 
 
android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE 
Write to sdcard - is needed to save images. 
 
 
android.permission.VIBRATE 
Vibration - is needed to vibrate on pressing on some buttons. 
 
 
android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE 
Is needed to get precise screen orientation (0, 90, 270, 180) and allows to rotate images correctly.
This feature requires access to storage permission
Can\'t create folder to save file. Check folder path on \"Other settings\" screen.
Your device don\'t have any gallery application. Install gallery to use this feature
No fonts found in your system.
You can put your custom TTF fonts to folder. \nIf you don\'t have access to this folder from phone, use your PC to access folder. \nFolder address:
You can\'t delete last available color
If enabled, touching canvas by two fingers will activate zoom. If disabled, touching canvas by two fingers will draw two lines.
Fragment will be saved with this resolution
There is not enough memory to save the fragment
If you choose too many tools, the program will work unstable (they may not fit on the screen)
When enabled, program will use vibration to confirm actions like long click or button click. When disabled, vibration still can happen if controlled by system.
Open system menu to change application language. Changing language will restart application, please save your work before changing language.
You can select any amount of buttons. If buttons too few, menu will be located in center of the strip.
Many buttons and forms in UI will have rectangle form, and also in many places rectangles roundings will be removed. To see any difference, scroll or re-enter settings.
Many buttons and forms in UI will have circle form. To see any difference, scroll or re-enter settings.
Many buttons and forms in UI will have squircle form. To see any difference, scroll or re-enter settings.

When "Auto" selected and you enabled screen rotation in your device settings, program UI will rotate when you rotate phone. 
During rotation, the drawing may be cropped or not saved because dimensions of canvas is changing. 
Previous copy of your drawing is always available in "Open -> Autosaves" screen. 
Keep in mind, that drawings can be opened for editing only in same orientation as you created it, because of dimensions difference. 
This setting changes will be applied only after program restart.

Canvas will always stay in landscape (horizontal) orientation even if you hold your device vertically. \nKeep in mind, that drawings can be opened for editing only in same orientation as you created it, because of dimensions difference. \nThis setting changes will be applied only after program restart.

Canvas will always stay in portrait (vertical) orientation even if you hold your device horizontally. \nKeep in mind, that drawings can be opened for editing only in same orientation as you created it, because of dimensions difference. \nThis setting changes will be applied only after program restart.
While working with the program, help will be available in different places, which will allow you to understand the functionality more easily.

👋 Welcome to FP sDraw! 
You are on the canvas screen and the "Brush" tool is selected. 
 
🖌️ The "Brush" tool draws a line of the selected color. The line size can be selected in the menu. 
🔺 To use the eraser, press and hold the volume up button. 
🔻 To use gestures, press and hold the volume down button. 
📖 To quickly open the menu, press both volume buttons. 
🔍 You can use two fingers to scale the drawing. 
 
☝️ Swipe across the screen to start drawing.

You are on the gesture input screen. From here you can get quick access to frequently used functions. 
 
☝️ To perform the corresponding action, swipe with one finger. 
🔍 You can use two fingers to zoom in on the picture.

You selected the "Eraser" tool. 
 
◻️ The "Eraser" tool erases the drawing area. You can choose the size of the area in the menu. 
 
☝️ To start erasing, swipe over a non-empty part of the picture.

You selected the "Painting" tool. 
 
🏺 The "Painting" tool paints a fragment of a similar shade with the selected color. The fragment tolerance can be selected in the menu. 
 
☝️ To paint a fragment, touch it.

You selected the "Mosaic" tool. 
 
🧩 The "Mosaic" tool replaces a fragment of a picture with cubes of a similar color. 
 The size of the cubes can be selected in the menu. It is usually used to hide objects. 
 
☝️ To apply, swipe over a non-empty fragment of the picture.

You selected the "Text" tool. 
 
🅰️ The "Text" tool allows you to add an inscription to a picture. When the text is already placed on the picture, it cannot be edited, it can only be canceled. 
First, the text is entered, then it is placed on the picture. 
 
☝️ To start typing, tap anywhere on the picture. Next, you can position the text in the desired place of the picture.

↔️ You are on the text move screen. Select the text position. After confirmation, it will become part of the drawing and the text cannot be changed. 
 
☝️ Swipe with one finger to move the text. 
🔍 You can zoom or rotate text with two fingers. 
🧰 To perform another action, use the menu. Holding the menu button will show the purpose of the button.

You selected the "Select and Move" tool. 
 
✂️ The Select and Move tool allows you to draw over a part of a drawing and move, scale, rotate, or copy it. 
 
☝️ To select a fragment, circle it. Then you can move it. 
⬇️ You can also select with the cursor or select the entire picture using the buttons below.

You are on the canvas screen and tool for selecting a fragment of picture by cursor is selected. 
 
✂️ Selecting with the cursor allows you to circle the desired area with polygons, placing each point manually, achieving a more accurate contour. 
 
☝️ To move the cursor, slide your finger across the screen. 
☝️ To add a point in the place where the cursor is now - click on the screen. 
⬇️ To cancel, remove the last point, or complete the selection, use the buttons below.

You are on the screen to move the selected image fragment. 
 
☝️ To move the fragment, slide your finger across the screen. 
🔍 Use two fingers to zoom or rotate. 
🧰 To perform another action, use the menu. Holding the menu button will show the purpose of the button.

You selected the "Shape Drawing" tool. 
 
🔳 The "Drawing shapes" tool allows you to add graphic primitives, such as a rectangle, triangle, etc. to the drawing. 
 
☝️To create a shape, click on its icon in the menu below. Next, you can place the shape in the desired place of the drawing.

You are on the screen of moving the created shape. 
 
☝️ To move the figure, slide your finger across the screen. 
🔍 Use two fingers to zoom or rotate. 
🧰 To perform another action, use the menu. Holding the menu button will show the purpose of the button.

You selected the "Line drawing" tool. 
 
📏 The tool allows you to add a straight line between two points to the drawing. 
Line thickness can be selected in the menu. 
 
☝️ Swipe your finger across the screen to draw a line.

You selected the "Precise Brush" tool. 
 
↖️ The precise brush allows you to draw small elements with the help of the cursor. 
Drawing occurs only when the draw button in the upper left corner of the screen is pressed. 
You can move the cursor around the screen with one finger, and press the draw button with the other finger. Will work even if you do it at the same time. 
In Precision Brush mode, you can use several tools, which can be switched using the button in the lower right corner of the screen. 
 
☝️ To draw, move the cursor to the desired place of the drawing, then hold down the drawing button, and without releasing the drawing button, swipe with another finger while moving the cursor.

You selected the "Eyedropper" tool. 
 
🎨 The eyedropper allows you to choose the color of the drawing from the picture. 
The color will be selected as current, but will not be added to the palette. You can add it to the palette in the settings by pressing the color in the palette. 
The eyedropper does not take into account the transparency of the color. 
The selected color and its code are displayed in the upper left corner of the screen. 
 
☝️ To choose a color, swipe over a non-empty part of the picture.

You have zoomed in a lot, pixel art mode is activated. 
 
🔍 In this mode, settings are set that simplify pixel-by-pixel drawing: 
- The grid that separates the pixels is displayed. 
- The size of the brush and eraser is set to 1 pixel. 
- Smoothing of contours, transparency is disabled. 
 
☝️ As soon as you reduce the scale of the picture, the settings will return to what they were.
Use only a digital pen even in the interface

Hardware acceleration of the canvas allows the system to draw the interface more smoothly with the help of a video card. \nOn some devices, it happens that it starts to slow down during drawing. This means that this device spends a lot of time transferring the picture to the video card. \nTo avoid this transfer, you can disable hardware acceleration. This will degrade the smoothness of the interface in general, but improve the smoothness when drawing.
